video.title: Curious George
video.synopsis: Little ones can learn a lot from George -- one of the most curious monkeys in all of literature -- with adventures narrated by William H. Macy.

episodes.synopsis: A gusty morning leads George to experiment with aerodynamics. / George wants to prove the innocence of a cat accused of scratching restaurant booths.
episodes.title: Flies a Kite / From Scratch

episodes.synopsis: George makes a home for a pigeon on their balcony. / When George sees a lady leaving packages behind wherever she goes, he thinks she's forgetful.
episodes.title: George's Home for Pigeons / Out of Order

episodes.synopsis: George learns all about zero. / George must clean spilled grape juice from the new rug before The Man with the Yellow Hat returns!
episodes.title: Zeros to Donuts / Stain Remover

episodes.synopsis: George wants to build a boat for Bill after he discovers Bill's boat sinks. / The Dulsons ask George to wear roller skates in front of their store.
episodes.title: Buoy Wonder / Roller Monkey

episodes.synopsis: George decides to explore the inside of the big library clock to see how it works. / George falls in love with neighbor Bill's new pet bunnies.
episodes.title: On Time / Bunny Hunt

episodes.synopsis: George sniffs his way to Chef Pisghetti's Ristorante, where he finds Gnocchi the cat. / Chef Pisghetti suggests that George help wash the windows.
episodes.title: Takes a Job / Takes Another Job

episodes.synopsis: When George finds some intriguing packages, the building lobby is soon filled with balls! / Feeding the ducks turns into a trip down the river.
episodes.title: Door Monkey / Goes Up the River

episodes.synopsis: George discovers some amazing things about the dynamics of sound. / George can't wait to see what's inside professor Wiseman's birthday present.
episodes.title: Invisible Sound / Peeling Monkey

episodes.synopsis: George and Professor Wiseman spend the day with all kinds of dogs on Dog Show Day. / George decides to store food in the ground like a squirrel.
episodes.title: Dog Counter / Squirrel for a Day

episodes.synopsis: George is thrilled when Bill asks him to look after his tadpoles. / Hundley and George get locked out of the building in the back alley.
episodes.title: Discovers the Poles / Finds His Way

episodes.synopsis: After a big rain, George is ecstatic to discover ducks swimming in a big puddle next to the country house. / George learns a lot about magnets.
episodes.title: Water to Ducks / Animal Magnetism

episodes.synopsis: George discovers a stethoscope is a pretty handy thing. / George and Gnocchi think a skyscraper construction site is more fun than a playground.
episodes.title: Doctor Monkey / The Architect

episodes.synopsis: Entranced by the baby panda at the zoo, George misses closing time and is accidentally locked inside. / George dog-sits Charkie.
episodes.title: Zoo Night / Charkie Escapes

episodes.synopsis: George delivers supplies to the International Space Station. / George and The Man with the Yellow Hat offer to pick up Bill when his train comes in.
episodes.title: Rocket Ride / Station Master

episodes.synopsis: George meets a family of beavers. / George can't understand why his high score isn't a winner when he plays his first game of mini-golf.
episodes.title: Dam Builders / Low High Score

episodes.synopsis: George is determined to count all the stars in the sky. / Chef Pisghetti gives George an ice cream sculpture in the shape of Gnocchi.
episodes.title: Sees Stars / Gets a Trophy

episodes.synopsis: To earn money for a new soccer ball, George decides to set up his own lemonade stand. / George decides to adjust a new traffic light.
episodes.title: Makes a Stand / Sees the Light

episodes.synopsis: George agrees to watch Cayley's candy counter for an afternoon. / George is inspired to become a volunteer with the fire department.
episodes.title: Candy Counter / Rescue Monkey

episodes.synopsis: George accidentally loses a batch of Chef Pisghetti's newest creation: Giardino Burgers. / George gets scared when he explores a mysterious cave.
episodes.title: Truth About George Burger / In the Dark

episodes.synopsis: The yellow hat comes back from the dry cleaners so beautiful that George wants to show it off. / George meets up with a baby bear and a stinging bee.
episodes.title: Clean Perfect Yellow Hat / Bee Is for Bear

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's helping plan a surprise birthday party for Mr. Quint. / The Man with the Yellow Hat can't figure out why George won't take a bath.
episodes.title: Surprise Quints / Muddy Monkey

episodes.synopsis: Ready for vacation, the Man with the Yellow Hat and George learn their flight is delayed. / George and Mr. Quint find an eel in Lake Wanasink.
episodes.title: A Vacation / The One That Got Away

episodes.synopsis: George can't wait to play outside after a blizzard drops a foot of snow. / George needs money to buy the toy oven in the window at the toy store.
episodes.title: Ski Monkey / George the Grocer

episodes.synopsis: George tries to keep the cows from eating all the wildflowers. / George is convinced a bone he discovers is part of a dinosaur skeleton.
episodes.title: Keep Out Cows / The Missing Piece

episodes.synopsis: George loves his first camping trip so much that he wants to go again. / George isn't tall enough to ride the greatest roller coaster of all time.
episodes.title: Camping with Hundley/ George vs.Turbo Python 3000

episodes.synopsis: George learns the hard way about bones when he falls and breaks his leg. / George loves his new bike, and helps Bill with his paper route.
episodes.title: Housebound! / George Rides a Bike

episodes.synopsis: George recruits his pals for a band inspired by local firefighters. / George and The Man with the Yellow Hat have a sand castle building contest.
episodes.title: All-Animal Recycled Band / The Times of Sand

episodes.synopsis: George becomes convinced the new upstairs neighbor has a pet elephant. / George experiments with being a cat, a pigeon and a dog.
episodes.title: The Elephant Upstairs / Being Hundley

episodes.synopsis: George and Steve borrow Betsy's wagon to pick up a package, but on the way they lose a wheel. / George makes friends with a turtle.
episodes.title: Fixes Betsy's Wagon / Takes a Dive

episodes.synopsis: George decides he wants to be an acrobat. / Winter is coming and George is miserable imagining life without the fun summertime activities he loves.
episodes.title: Unbalanced / George vs. Winter

episodes.synopsis: George discovers what it takes for a balloon to score a successful liftoff. / A skunk eats George's sandwich.
episodes.title: Up, Up and Away / Skunked

episodes.synopsis: George stumbles upon a secret world of underground tunnels. / Professor Wiseman entrusts George with a tiny kitten too young to take care of herself.
episodes.title: Monkey Underground / Cat Mother

episodes.synopsis: Tiring of table manners and house rules, George decides to build a nest of his own. / George accidently crushes the Man with the Yellow Hat's hat.
episodes.title: Up a Tree / Curious George and the Trash

episodes.synopsis: George must find a way to fix Besty's xylophone. / It's bowling night! But when George rolls, it's always a gutter ball.
episodes.title: Gets All Keyed Up / Gutter Monkey

episodes.synopsis: It's up to George to replace a space telescope's batteries. / George is ready for a day of fun with friends at Betsy's birthday party.
episodes.title: Grease Monkeys in Space / Pinata Vision

episodes.synopsis: George is surprised to find Hundley bouncing around the apartment building. / George sets out to gather a collection of signs from all around town.
episodes.title: All-New Hundley / Signs Up

episodes.synopsis: George goes to the zoo and meets a painting elephant. / George realizes the rules of his favorite game are the same rules for following directions.
episodes.title: Color Me Monkey / Special Delivery Monkey

episodes.synopsis: When flea season begins, Hundley's dignity goes right out the window. / George enters the local "Bag Olympics" for bagging groceries.
episodes.title: Free Hundley / Bag Monkey

episodes.synopsis: George volunteers to help out at the town talent show. / George tries to help Chef Pisghetti gather fresh vegetables by weeding the chef's garden.
episodes.title: Monkey Stagehand / The Magic Garden

episodes.synopsis: George brings some new bath toys into the tub with him. / Bill and the Man with the Yellow Hat are excited for their big hike.
episodes.title: Plumber's Helper/ Takes a Hike

episodes.synopsis: George wants a fun hat. / George tries to solve the mystery of who or what is eating all the food from the bird feeder.
episodes.title: Fully Automatic Monkey Fun Hat / Creatures of the Night

episodes.synopsis: George and Hundley venture into the basement to store away some of George's toys. / George is out playing ball when he's called in for bedtime.
episodes.title: Scaredy Dog / Say Goodnight, George

episodes.synopsis: George rescues six stranded chicks on an island. / George tends to the Man with the Yellow Hat, who has a terrible case of the sniffles.
episodes.title: A Bridge Too Farm / Monkey Fever

episodes.synopsis: George fantasizes about becoming a real-life spy. / While George practices his golf swing, Bill shows him how to send the ball high in the air.
episodes.title: Spy Monkey / Castle Keep

episodes.synopsis: George joins his friends on a stroll through an amazing new robot exhibit. / George watches a gopher snake and two mice for the day.
episodes.title: Robot Monkey Hullabaloo / The Slithery Day

episodes.synopsis: While racing to recover his friend's treasure, George stumbles across an elaborate spider web. / George thinks hibernation is a great idea!
episodes.title: Web Master / The Big Sleepy

episodes.synopsis: Lobby dachshund Hundley longs to set sail on the ocean blue. / George finds the sailboat of his dreams at Dulson's Toy Store.
episodes.title: George Sinks the Pirates / This Little Piggy

episodes.synopsis: A princess scoops up Hundley, claiming that he is a royal doggy! / George's bad day gets better when he gets a new cap.
episodes.title: King Doggie / The Lucky Cap

episodes.synopsis: George and the Man with the Yellow Hat are invited on a submarine trip; Mr. Renkins is too busy to attend the state finals for his prize pig.
episodes.title: Sea Monkey / Old McGeorgie Had a Farm

episodes.synopsis: A maestro announces that George is the winner of the conductor-for-a-day contest. / George learns what items are necessary when digging a big hole.
episodes.title: George Beats the Band / Hats and a Hole

episodes.synopsis: George and the Man with the Yellow Hat have a blast in the Antarctic. / George and Bill run out of carrots while feeding the rabbits.
episodes.title: Ice Station Monkey / The Perfect Carrot

episodes.synopsis: George accidentally turns on the cider press at Renkin's Farm. / It's the hottest day of the year, and to cool down, George wants to build a snowman.
episodes.title: George Meets the Press / Snow Use

episodes.synopsis: George loves feeding the birds, but the seeds keep disappearing! / Professor Wiseman needs help assembling rare dinosaur bones into a skeleton.
episodes.title: For the Birds / Curious George-Asaurus

episodes.synopsis: The secret to Bill's garden is the compost he uses to feed his plants. / George and the Man with the Yellow Hat must complete one last junk pickup.
episodes.title: Mulch Ado About Nothing / What Goes Up

episodes.synopsis: George's navigating skills are put to the test at a maze race. / After a bubble bath, George promises that he will stay clean.
episodes.title: Amazing Maze Race / The Color of Monkey

episodes.synopsis: The Man with the Yellow Hat loses his balance and lands in poison ivy. / The city celebrates Whistlepig Wednesday.
episodes.title: Man with the Monkey Hands / Whistlepig Wednesday

episodes.synopsis: Why is Bill yelling at a mound of dirt? He's worm racing! / George is eager to help his building earn an award for collecting the most recycling.
episodes.title: George Digs Worms / Everything Old Is New

episodes.synopsis: A bus takes off with the Man in the Yellow Hat's portfolio still inside. / George and the Man with the Yellow Hat offer to help Chef Pisghetti.
episodes.title: The Wheels on the Bus / Seed Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Dulson's Toy Store is having a contest! / George is tired of his fun always being ruined by the weather.
episodes.title: Fun Ball Talley / Red Sky at Night, Monkey's Delight

episodes.synopsis: George and the Man with the Yellow Hat take a ride on a sailboat. / George gives his friends a guided tour of the countryside.
episodes.title: Shipwrecked with Hundley / Chasing Rainbow

episodes.synopsis: The Chef decides to stop cooking and close the restaurant! / Armed with a vacuum, George watches as his new "toy" sucks up everything in sight.
episodes.title: Gnocchi the Critic / George Cleans Up

episodes.synopsis: George convinces Professor Wiseman to take a break from work. / Charkie will do anything to get what's inside of Aunt Margaret's parcel.
episodes.title: Relax! / The Box and the Hound

episodes.synopsis: Poor Hundley -- it's the first time he's been apart from the Doorman in more than three years. / George is taking pictures of wild animals.
episodes.title: Night of the Wiener Dog / Animal Trackers

episodes.synopsis: Chef Pisghetti is cooking up a strand of spaghetti that measures 30 feet! / To beat the scorching summer heat, George visits the museum.
episodes.title: George Measures Up / Something New Under the Sun

episodes.synopsis: George and the Man with the Yellow Hat try to save the movie theater. / Professor Wiseman's approach to cooking leads to an unsuccessful cake.
episodes.title: Movie House Monkey / Cooking with Monkey

episodes.synopsis: Professor Wiseman enlists George as her personal trainer. / George has just been made an Honorary Junior Sprout of Country County.
episodes.title: Curious George, Personal Trainer / Sprout Outing

episodes.synopsis: George and the Man with the Yellow Hat are hooked on Juicy Jay's special blended juice. / George's favorite bird is on the endangered species list!
episodes.title: Juicy George / The Big Picture

episodes.synopsis: George spends the entire day showing Allie what it's like to be a monkey. / George and Hundley chase Gnocchi into Pisghetti's basement.
episodes.title: George Meets Allie-Whoops! / Hundley's Great

episodes.synopsis: There's a germ lingering inside George's body that has him sneezing and coughing. / A dry spell has lowered the water level of the lake.
episodes.title: The Inside Story / The Little Fish, Littler Pond

episodes.synopsis: Allie invites George to school as a special guest monkey! / Charkie's building has a new rule: All dogs must have a good-behavior diploma.
episodes.title: Guest Monkey / Charkie Goes to School

episodes.synopsis: Nothing can stop George from listening to his favorite band. / George takes over as chief egg-sitter when Dumpling Duck takes a break.
episodes.title: George and Marco Sound It Out / A Monkey's Duckling

episodes.synopsis: George and the Man with the Yellow Hat get to ride the subway on their trip to the zoo. / George needs a bath, but there's no running water.
episodes.title: George's Super Subway Adventure / Well Done, George

episodes.synopsis: George begins to collect interestingly shaped sticks. / George loves to watch Jade the chameleon, who has the world's fastest tongue.
episodes.title: Trader George / One in a Million Chameleon

episodes.synopsis: George enlists Allie to help him make a cool car for the annual soap box derby. / Book-loving George volunteers to help the librarian.
episodes.title: Downhill Racer / Book Monkey

episodes.synopsis: It's hard being a little monkey in a big world. / There's no better way to spend a sunny day than by playing with your favorite robot on the beach.
episodes.title: Monkey Size Me / Metal Detective

episodes.synopsis: George is entranced by the museum's vending machine, which is full of levers, wheels, springs and healthy snacks! / George's cool new scarf unravels.
episodes.title: George-O-Matic / Curious George, Sheep Herder

episodes.synopsis: While Marco tries to hit his first Little League home run, George gets to play scorekeeper. / George is inspired to build an igloo.
episodes.title: George's Home Run / Monkey on Ice

episodes.synopsis: The Doorman gets a special delivery -- a Western Town to add to his train set. / George ventures into the new neighborhood Vietnamese grocery store.
episodes.title: Go West, Young Monkey / Meet the New Neighbors

episodes.synopsis: Steve makes a model papyrus boat to help him pass his history class. / Compass and his friends eat the seeds from George's freshly planted garden.
episodes.title: Follow That Boat / Windmill Monkey

episodes.synopsis: It's Mother's Day, and Marco wants to surprise his mom with a party. / George, Allie and Bill join a gymnastics class.
episodes.title: Mother's Day Surprise / Jungle Gym

episodes.synopsis: Bill announces he's leaving town because he doesn't know how to dance the box step. / Chef Pisghetti is distraught: his chickens won't lay any eggs!
episodes.title: School of Dance / Curious George Sounds Off

episodes.synopsis: George and Bill want to buy the kite on display at Ada & Luke's Country Store. / George has an adventure during a trip to Mabel's Department Store.
episodes.title: George Buys a Kite / Train of Light

episodes.synopsis: George and Marco attend their first auction. / George is going to see Betsy's favorite opera, but Betsy has to stay home because she has chicken pox.
episodes.title: Auctioneer George / Sock Monkey Opera

episodes.synopsis: George and Allie make a sculpture of Bill's sprained thumb. / Betsy's entry for the photo contest is sure to win ... until George and Steve ruin it.
episodes.title: George and the Giant Thumb / Shutter Monkey

episodes.synopsis: Steve's pet hamster is on the loose in the city with nothing but a small video camera tied to his back. / Chef Pisghetti's cookbook has vanished!
episodes.title: Hamster Cam / The Great Monkey Detective

episodes.synopsis: George helps Mr. Zoobel to create a rooftop wind symphony. / George and Allie are so impressed by an automatic car wash that they build their own.
episodes.title: Wind Symphony / George and Allie's Automated Car Wash

episodes.synopsis: As George cleans up his mess, he spots an army of ants. / George learns maple syrup comes from trees, so he and Allie try to replenish their supply.
episodes.title: Feeling Antsy / Maple Monkey Madness

episodes.synopsis: The Man with the Yellow Hat wins tickets to a Bonnie Smooth concert! / George's Native American friend makes a sand painting of the happy monkey.
episodes.title: DJ George / Curious George Paints the Desert

episodes.synopsis: Where others see trash, George sees hidden treasures. / George and the Man with the Yellow Hat find an unexpected guest living in their country home.
episodes.title: Junky Monkey / Jumpy Warms Up

episodes.synopsis: Why is Chef Pisghetti's cat spending so much time away from home? / At a treasure hunt at the beach, George and Marco bury their own treasure.
episodes.title: No Knowing Gnocchi / Here Comes the Tide
